message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
That's a bit high for me, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $8,500.  What do you think?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $13,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,000 is still a bit out of my range. I'm happy to pay $9,000 for it. Let's see if we can make this work.
